Content.Text:
<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You want to know if something good has
happened to me? Is it that obvious?

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm a little embarrassed by this, but
yes, I have had a lovely day today.
<PAGE>
I have a fiancé, who for now I have to
be apart from, but today I got a letter
from him.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
The content of the letter was pretty
much what you might expect...
<PAGE>
But being apart, unable to talk about
even everyday things, the letter made
me really happy!

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
He proposed to me very soon after we
started dating, but now has to travel
around world on business.
<PAGE>
Once his work is finished we'll be able
to spend every day together, and I'm so
looking forward to when that time comes.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You want to know more about him?

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let me see... well, he's like the
murmuring of a small brook.
<PAGE>
Also gentle, always kind, and so
relaxing just to be near. I just feel
the tension melting away.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry, I'm doing all the talking.
<PAGE>
What about you, <MYNAME>? How's your
relationship going?

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Could you tell me something you've done
recently?

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, that sounds lovely. I'm quite
jealous! Thank you for sharing!

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, don't mind me.
<PAGE>
Hearing how happy you are just makes me
feel happy too!

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hearing that someone I care about 
is happy, someone like you, <MYNAME>,
makes me just as happy.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hearing about my happiness makes you
feel happy too, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm glad to hear that.
<PAGE>
Would you like to join me at my place,
drink some delicious tea and talk about
things a little more?
<PAGE>
I've just got some delicious new tea and
biscuits in, actually.  I'm sure you'll
like them, <MYNAME>!
